body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. My name is Elijah Watson and I'm from AutoRapid, how may I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Elijah, my name is Elizabeth Phillips.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Elizabeth. To assist you better, could you provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven eight zero two three four one two five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. May I also have your postal code for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's M one one two X two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Elizabeth. Is there a specific concern you'd like to discuss today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I've recently purchased a car from your dealership and I'm facing some issues with the return process. I'm quite disappointed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Elizabeth. We will certainly look into this matter and try to resolve it for you. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time. Have a great day, Elizabeth.
